item.title: Form Group
item.description: Label states with Text Input: {{< hackcss-formgroup >}} {{< hackcss-label for="default" text="Default:" />}} {{< hackcss-textinput id="default" >}} {{< /hackcss-formgroup >}} {{< hackcss-formgroup state="success" >}} {{< hackcss-label for="success" text="Success:" />}} {{< hackcss-textinput id="success" >}} {{< /hackcss-formgroup >}} {{< hackcss-formgroup state="warning" >}} {{< hackcss-label for="warning" text="Warning:" />}} {{< hackcss-textinput id="warning" >}} {{< /hackcss-formgroup >}} {{< hackcss-formgroup state="error" >}} {{< hackcss-label for="error" text="Error:" />}} {{< hackcss-textinput id="error" >}} {{< /hackcss-formgroup >}} Default: Success: Warning: Error: Disabling Label and disabled Text Area with Help Block:
item.content:encoded: Label states with Text Input: {{&lt; hackcss-formgroup &gt;}} {{&lt; hackcss-label for=&#34;default&#34; text=&#34;Default:&#34; /&gt;}} {{&lt; hackcss-textinput id=&#34;default&#34; &gt;}} {{&lt; /hackcss-formgroup &gt;}} {{&lt; hackcss-formgroup state=&#34;success&#34; &gt;}} {{&lt; hackcss-label for=&#34;success&#34; text=&#34;Success:&#34; /&gt;}} {{&lt; hackcss-textinput id=&#34;success&#34; &gt;}} {{&lt; /hackcss-formgroup &gt;}} {{&lt; hackcss-formgroup state=&#34;warning&#34; &gt;}} {{&lt; hackcss-label for=&#34;warning&#34; text=&#34;Warning:&#34; /&gt;}} {{&lt; hackcss-textinput id=&#34;warning&#34; &gt;}} {{&lt; /hackcss-formgroup &gt;}} {{&lt; hackcss-formgroup state=&#34;error&#34; &gt;}} {{&lt; hackcss-label for=&#34;error&#34; text=&#34;Error:&#34; /&gt;}} {{&lt; hackcss-textinput id=&#34;error&#34; &gt;}} {{&lt; /hackcss-formgroup &gt;}} Default: Success: Warning: Error: Disabling Label and disabled Text Area with Help Block: {{&lt; hackcss-formgroup hastextarea=&#34;true&#34; disabled=&#34;true&#34; &gt;}} {{&lt; hackcss-helpblock &gt;}}&lt;strong&gt;Sorry! Guestbook offline…&lt;/strong&gt;{{&lt; /hackcss-helpblock &gt;}} {{&lt; hackcss-label for=&#34;message&#34; text=&#34;Message:&#34; /&gt;}} {{&lt; hackcss-textarea id=&#34;message&#34; rows=&#34;10&#34; &gt;}} {{&lt; /hackcss-formgroup &gt;}} Sorry! Guestbook offline… Message:
